title: How to Block Someone on Hinge Before Matching

steps.title: Open Hinge.
steps.content: Open Hinge. The app's icon looks like a capital "H" on a white background that you'll find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap the H tab.
steps.content: Tap the H tab. It's the "Discovery" or "Standouts" tab where you'll see individual profiles that you can potentially match with.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . This three-dot menu icon is in the top right corner of their profile tile.

steps.title: Tap Remove.
steps.content: Tap Remove . It's usually the first option in the menu.

steps.title: Select a reason for removing that person.
steps.content: Select a reason for removing that person. Your reason is private and will not be shared with the other person. Once you select a reason, you'll see a small "X" animation that shows the remove has been submitted. That person will also not see you and you won't see their profile again. [1] X Research source
